00007 #ifndef UNITCONVERSION_H_
00008 #define UNITCONVERSION_H_
00009 
00010 const double pi = 3.1415926; 
00011 
00012 const double Day2Sec = 86400;                                           // day -> sec;
00013 const double Sec2Day = 1 / Day2Sec;
00014 
00015 const double Lb2Kg = 0.45359237;                                        // lb -> Kg;
00016 const double Kg2Lb = 1 / Lb2Kg;
00017 
00018 const double Ft2M = 0.3048;                                                     // ft -> m;
00019 const double M2Ft = 1 / Ft2M;
00020 
00021 const double Psi2Pa = 6894.75729;                                       // Psi -> Pa;
00022 const double Pa2Psi = 1 / Psi2Pa;
00023 
00024 const double Sft2Sm = Ft2M * Ft2M;                                      // ft^2 -> m^2;
00025 const double Sm2Sft = 1 / Sft2Sm;
00026 
00027 const double Cft2Cm = Ft2M * Ft2M * Ft2M;                       // ft^3 -> m^3;
00028 const double Cm2Cft = 1 / Cft2Cm;
00029 
00030 const double Bbl2Cft = 5.614583333;                                     // bbl -> ft^3;
00031 const double Cft2Bbl = 1 / Bbl2Cft;
00032 
00033 const double Mcft2Cft = 1000;                                           // Mft^3 -> ft^3;
00034 const double Cft2Mcft = 1 / Mcft2Cft;
00035 
00036 const double Lb_Cft2Kg_Cm = Lb2Kg * Cm2Cft;                     // lb/ft^3 -> Kg/m^3; 16.0184634;
00037 const double Kg_Cm2Lb_Cft = 1 / Lb_Cft2Kg_Cm;           
00038 
00039 const double Ft_Day2M_Sec = Ft2M * Sec2Day;                     // ft/day -> m/sec; 3.5278e-006;
00040 const double M_Sec2Ft_Day = 1 / Ft_Day2M_Sec;
00041 
00042 const double CFt_Day2CM_Sec = Ft2M*Ft2M*Ft2M * Sec2Day;         // ft^3/day -> m^3/sec;
00043 const double CM_Sec2CFt_Day = 1 / Ft_Day2M_Sec;
00044 
00045 const double Lb_Day2Kg_Sec = Lb2Kg * Sec2Day;           // Lb_day -> Kg_Sec; 0.45359237/86400
00046 const double Kg_Sec2Lb_Day = 1 / Lb_Day2Kg_Sec;         
00047 
00048 const double Cp2PaSec = 0.001;                                          // cp -> Pa*sec;
00049 const double PaSec2Cp = 1 / Cp2PaSec;
00050 
00051 // thermal extension
00052 const double Btu_Lb2J_Kg = 2324.4;
00053 const double J_Kg2Btu_Lb = 1 / Btu_Lb2J_Kg;   // 0.43021
00054 
00055 const double Btu_Day2J_Sec = 0.01220833;
00056 const double J_Sec2Btu_Day = 1 / Btu_Day2J_Sec;
00057 
00058 const double Btu_Day_Sft_R2W_SM_K = 0.073;
00059 const double W_SM_K2Btu_Day_Sft_R = 1 / Btu_Day_Sft_R2W_SM_K;
00060 
00061 const double FtDay2MSec = Ft2M * Day2Sec;
00062 const double MSec2FtDay = 1/FtDay2MSec;
00063 
00064 const double Lb_Day_Psi2Kg_Sec_Pa = Lb2Kg / Day2Sec / Psi2Pa;
00065 const double Kg_Sec_Pa2Lb_Day_Psi = 1/Lb_Day_Psi2Kg_Sec_Pa;
00066 
00067 const double FtDayPsi2MSecPa = Ft2M * Day2Sec * Psi2Pa;
00068 const double MSecPa2FtDayPsi = 1/FtDayPsi2MSecPa;
